item.title: Danika add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "The universe is a big place, perhaps the biggest." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Danika add a quote by Annie Dillard
item.description: "There were no formerly heroic times, and there was no formerly pure generation. There is no one here but us chickens, and so it has always been." -- Annie Dillard

item.title: Danika add a quote by James Baldwin
item.description: "Anyone who has ever struggled with poverty knows how extremely expensive it is to be poor." -- James Baldwin

item.title: Danika add a quote by Nick Hornby
item.description: "If you really wanted to mess me up, you should have got to me earlier." -- Nick Hornby

item.title: Danika add a quote by Margaret Atwood
item.description: "Men are afraid that women will laugh at them. Women are afraid that men will kill them." -- Margaret Atwood

item.title: Danika add a quote by Erin McKean
item.description: "You don’t owe prettiness to anyone. Not to your boyfriend/spouse/partner, not to your co-workers, especially not to random men on the street. You don’t owe it to your mother, you don’t owe it to your children, you don’t owe it to civilization in general. Prettiness is not a rent you pay for occupying a space marked ‘female’." -- Erin McKean

item.title: Danika add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "Many people need desperately to receive this message: 'I feel and think much as you do, care about many of the things you care about, although most people do not care about them. You are not alone." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Danika add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "While it is always possible to wake a person who's sleeping, no amount of noise will wake a person who is pretending to be asleep." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Danika add a quote by Matt Groening
item.description: "I know all those words, but that sentence makes no sense to me." -- Matt Groening

item.title: Danika add a quote by Charlotte Brontë
item.description: "I would always rather be happy than dignified." -- Charlotte Brontë

item.title: Danika add a quote by Rebecca West
item.description: "I myself have never been able to find out precisely what feminism is: I only know that people call me a feminist whenever I express sentiments that differentiate me from a doormat, or a prostitute." -- Rebecca West

item.title: Danika add a quote by Isaac Asimov
item.description: "Never let your sense of morals prevent you from doing what is right." -- Isaac Asimov
